name: SD Gundam G Generation 3D
overview: SD Gundam G Generation 3D takes advantage of the 3DS's capabilities and lets the player experience solid 3D maps and combat screens with an original scenario based on Gundam. Mobile suits move in and out in impressive combat scenes. This version also marks the debut of Mobile Suit Gundam AGE! This is the first time Gundam AGE will appear in a home video game.
